items.title: Introduction To Data Science
items.headline: Use the R Programming Language to execute data science projects and become a data scientist.
objectives_summary: Start and execute the steps of a data science project, from project definition to model evaluation.
Use machine learning techniques to build effective predictive models.
Learn how to find and correct common problems found in real world data.

items.title: RASA :Build and Deploy Chatbot On The Cloud (100% FREE) 2021

visible_instructors.title: Yassine AI
visible_instructors.job_title: Build and Deploy your chatbot using RASA
visible_instructors.name: Yassine

items.headline: Your RASA Course Guide From Installation to Deployment And Get Your RASA Certification !
objectives_summary: Build chatbots
Connect your chatbots to a website or any plateform
Make your chatbot intelligent

items.title: Data Science Real-World Use Cases - Hands On Python
items.headline: Solve 3 real Business Problems, Build Robust AI, Ml , NLP and Time Series models in Real World Scenarios..
objectives_summary: Gain Hands on Data Science in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing , Time Series Analysis
Develop Natural Language Processing Models for fake news detection
Develop time series forecasting models to predict sales of a product

items.title: Causal Data Science with Directed Acyclic Graphs
items.headline: Get to know the modern tools for causal inference from machine learning and AI, with many practical examples in R
objectives_summary: Causal inference in data science and machine learning
How to work with directed acylic graphs (DAG)
Newest developments in causal AI

items.title: ML for Business Managers: Build Regression model in R Studio
items.headline: Simple Regression & Multiple Regression| must-know for Machine Learning & Econometrics | Linear Regression in R studio
objectives_summary: Learn how to solve real life problem using the Linear Regression technique
Preliminary analysis of data using Univariate and Bivariate analysis before running Linear regression
Predict future outcomes basis past data by implementing Simplest Machine Learning algorithm

items.title: The Complete Python and JavaScript Course: Build Projects

visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students
visible_instructors.name: John

items.headline: Want to learn ES6 development and TensorFlow stock market prediction modeling? Build your first web app in this course!
objectives_summary: Build web apps using JavaScript ES6!
Code in JavaScript and Python.
Calculate linear regression in the TensorFlow framework.

items.title: Master Data Science with Python in 10 Hours | 2021
items.headline: Learn Python, its libraries for Data Science (Pandas,Matplotlib,Seaborn) and data pre-processing for Machine Learning!
objectives_summary: Importance of Data Science and It's applications
Python - data types, functions, if conditions, loops and functions
Numpy library - a faster alternative to store data!

items.title: Modern Reinforcement Learning: Actor-Critic Algorithms
items.headline: How to Implement Cutting Edge Artificial Intelligence Research Papers in the Open AI Gym Using the PyTorch Framework
objectives_summary: How to code policy gradient methods in PyTorch
How to code Deep Deterministic Policy Gradients (DDPG) in PyTorch
How to code Twin Delayed Deep Deterministic Policy Gradients (TD3) in PyTorch

items.title: The Comprehensive Programming in R Course
items.headline: How to design and develop efficient general-purpose R applications for diverse tasks and domains.
objectives_summary: Acquire the skills needed to successfully develop general-purpose programming applications in the R environment

Possess an in-depth understanding of the R programming environment and of the requirements for, and programming implications of, writing code using basic R objects: vectors, matrices, dataframes and lists.
Understand the object-oriented characteristics of programming in R and know how to create S3 and S4 Class objects and functions that process these S3 and S4 objects.

items.title: Deploy Serverless Machine Learning Models to AWS Lambda
items.headline: Use Serverless Framework for fast deployment of different ML models to scalable and cost-effective AWS Lambda service.
objectives_summary: Deploy regression, NLP and computer vision machine learning models to scalable AWS Lambda environment
How to effectively prepare scikit-learn, spaCy and Keras / Tensorflow frameworks for deployment
How to use basics of AWS and Serverless Framework

items.title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow
items.headline: Channel the power of deep learning with Google's TensorFlow!
objectives_summary: Set up your computing environment and install TensorFlow
Build simple TensorFlow graphs for everyday computations
Apply logistic regression for classification with TensorFlow

items.title: The Comprehensive Statistics and Data Science with R Course
items.headline: Learn how to use R for data science tasks, all about R data structures, functions and visualizations, and statistics.
objectives_summary: Students will understand what R is, and how to input and output data files into their R sessions.
Students will know how to manipulate numbers and vectors, and will understand objects and classes.
Students will understand how to create data structures in R: vectors; arrays and matrices; lists and data frames.

items.title: Logistic Regression in R Studio
items.headline: Logistic regression in R Studio tutorial for beginners. You can do Predictive modeling using R Studio after this course.
objectives_summary: Understand how to interpret the result of Logistic Regression model and translate them into actionable insight
Learn the linear discriminant analysis and K-Nearest Neighbors technique in R studio
Learn how to solve real life problem using the different classification techniques

items.title: Survival Analysis in R
items.headline: Use R to master survival analysis, duration analysis, event time analysis or reliability analysis.
objectives_summary: The general concepts of survival analysis
How to use R for survival analysis
Identify the best packages for survival data

items.title: Natural Language Processing and Text Mining Without Coding
items.headline: Analyze Text using Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) techniques & Text Mining without writing a single line of code.
objectives_summary: Students will learn various Natural Language Processing techniques and build various real world examples all without writing a line of code.

items.headline: MBA in Creative Arts, Design and Animation: Level 2 - Part 5 course on Artificial Intelligence Music Creation Tools
objectives_summary: Be able to compose new music with using Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology tools in 2021.
Be able to remix their own created music with using Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology tools
Learn to find creative-commons music online for commercial use
